txt.en: You have defeated Thadúr, his lieutenants, and foiled his plans.
You have defeated the spider Legbarthril at the Northcotton Farm in the Shire.

Within the abandoned Northcotton Farm, Thadúr has created a powerful poison known as Darkthorn. Thadúr plans to unleash his poison on the unsuspecting hobbit-folk. You must foil his plans and defeat him before the poison can be unleashed.
You have destroyed the vile cauldron Úmheryn at the Northcotton Farm in the Shire.
You have defeated the Gaunt-lord Thadúr the Ravager at the Northcotton Farm in the Shire.
To earn this deed, you must defeat Legbarthil the Spider, Úmheryn the vile cauldron, and Thadúr the Ravager.
To earn this deed, you must defeat Legbarthil the Spider, Úmheryn the vile cauldron, and Thadúr the Ravager.
